appName: Hidden Memories of The Gardens Between

descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

displayName: Hidden Memories of The Gardens Between
display_name: Hidden Memories of The Gardens Between
display_long_description:
🐳 Major Sharpness and Clarity Update 🔍!  
Adding higher resolution and anti-aliasing for smooth and crisp visuals. Enhanced for Quest 3 and 3S.

-- 

Hidden Memories of The Gardens Between is a tranquil single-player adventure-puzzle game about time, memory and friendship.  

[media]

Best friends Arina and Frendt fall into a series of vibrant, dreamlike island gardens peppered with everyday objects from their childhood. Together they embark on an emotional journey that examines the significance of their friendship.  

Lost in a mysterious realm where cause and effect are malleable, the friends find that time flows in all directions. Manipulate time to solve puzzles and reach the apex of each isle. Follow the duo as they unpack and explore their significant moments spent together, lighting up constellations and illuminating threads of a bittersweet narrative.  

[media]

"Cleverly designed VR puzzles. Incredibly imaginative. 8.5 / 10"  
· VR Realm  

"Expressive, immersive, and emotional. 9 / 10"  
· Gaming Trend  

"Deserves every minute of your time. 9.5 / 10"  
· Gaming Boulevard  

“It healed something within me.”  
· Pixigonal  

[media]

FEATURES  
• Dreamy tale of adventure, friendship and growing-up  
• Manipulation of time makes cause and effect malleable  
• Relaxing, ambient soundtrack by feature-artist Tim Shiel  
• Accessible design; simple controls without fail states, text, speech or complex UI  

[media]

🏃‍♀️🏃‍♂️
